group_1.textRight: But what do you think happens if it gets completely tainted?

group_1.textLeft: Hm?

group_1.textRight: Like, I was just wondering if you'd lose your powers @or something...

group_1.textCenter: (I never thought that deeply about it...)
(What exactly happens to us when our power @becomes completely tainted...?)
(I want to know how to deal with it, so I'd better @make sure just for good measure.)

group_1.textLeft: Yes, who's there?
Ah, you're the head family's daughter.

group_1.textRight: Yes, I am Shizuka. I would like to speak with Lady Mikoshiba.

group_1.textLeft: Please wait a moment.

group_1.textRight: (Well, it's not like it's a secret, so I guess it's alright to ask...)

group_1.textLeft: Thanks for waiting. Please, come in.
Oho. What happens when thy power is completely tainted?

group_1.textRight: Er, if it's not something I should be asking, then @that's all right.

group_1.textLeft: No, no, it's not as if it's anything to be kept secret.
I suppose it's about time to tell thee, as well.
Here. Wouldst thou show me thy Jewel a moment?
Quite severely tainted by now, I see.

group_1.textRight: Yes. There's been fewer Devils near the village as of late...

group_1.textLeft: In that case, I suppose ye'll soon be seeking your independence.
S'pose things will get a little lonelier around here...
Oh, I do beg thy pardon.
Y'see, when the power of your Jewel there becomes completely tainted,
it's essentially your coming-of-age ritual as a Diviner. You'll have officially become an adult.
In other words, it'll be time for ye to venture outside @as a full-fledged Diviner.

group_1.textRight: ...I'd heard as much from my mother. But that whole story is true, then?

group_1.textLeft: Is it that surprising?

group_1.textRight: Well, I knew that my time would come too, @before long.
But I didn't think it was so closely related to this @Jewel.

group_1.textLeft: I am sorry for telling thee so late.

group_1.textRight: No, I'm glad that you were so kind as to tell me @about it.
With this, I'll be able to serve the Land of the Rising @Sun as a full-fledged Diviner.

group_1.textLeft: Here, let's have ourselves a teensy celebration in advance.
We received some delicious snacks just recently! @Fancy having some?
It's just an old lady's way of killing time. Humor me a moment, eh?
I've also been wanting to ask ye about the Hiroe daughter, if you don't mind.

group_1.textRight: Charu? Ask me anything you like!
